name: Kite (itch) (RobBCreates)
description:
Requires gamepad. 

LT - Lock-On (To enemies) 
A - Dash

B - Attack

Y - Interact

Enter the arena and fight through 5 waves as the space around you will vanish. 

This is missing a set of planned features due to poor scope management. Coins are always fun to collect but they don't do anything due to the above...
